ygData.subject: RE: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, share your secrets. Let us compare notes on efficiency of raising ones skill. ... From: blackhawk@nettally.com [mailto:blackhawk@nettally.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, share your secrets. Let us compare notes on efficiency of raising
ones skill.

-----Original Message-----
From: blackhawk@... [mailto:blackhawk@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 1:09 PM
To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] (no subject)


From: blackhawk@... (Cooper, Mark)

Well that is a good idea.. but TS is a lore item and you can only have
one
at a time or you lose it ..thus ... i can't stockpile the Ts bows. or i
would ... i don't like to be out marketed ...but i need to raise my
skill
lvl fast and thanks to the new tricks i have learn which you all probly
already know... i will be able to to that rather fast ... god i shudder
to
think of how much more pp i have spent that i did not need to ... well
live
and learn.

good huting
karvar
----- Original Message -----
From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 2:11 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] (no subject)


> From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
>
> I would say buy his bows at 100pp until he's out of materials. Then
sell
yours
> for 250pp :) 150pp for just holding an item for awhile. If you keep
buying
him
> out, he'll have to constantly travel for materials and he'll never be
able
to
> compete with you. Unfortunately, this'll only work if you have one
hell of
a lot
> of plat saved up =P
> -Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM
>
> "Cooper, Mark" wrote:
>
> > From: blackhawk@... (Cooper, Mark)
> >
> > Well at lvl 105 i made TS bow.. on third attempt ... but have tried
3
more
> > times and falled. so i stand at one out of 6 at lvl 105 ... but i
have a
big
> > bone to pick..i want to know what is fair price to sell bow at.... i
sell to
> > my guild members at 100pp and 10 servos and 10 kolka nuts... but to
non
> > guild members i sell at 250pp ... but now i have anouther fletcher
on
> > bristlebane sever selling the bows to public for 100pp .. and
harassing
me
> > in a very polite way ( he was not rude) to lower my price.. he says
this
> > will stop more peole form becoming fletchers... i fail to see his
> > logic...but his lvl is 190 and mine is 105 so he can pump them out
farter
> > that i can... but i have 80 pices of each item. so i can compete and
my
> > skill is gettting better .. but my charizma is 85 with buffs and his
starts
> > at 90 with out ... so this will be a challange.. my question is
after
all
> > our blood sweat and tears to work our way to master fletchers and
haveing no
> > market to speak or to sell our wears ...what is a fair price for a
bow
that
> > is cheap to make for us but has a very limited market ... at 100 pp
each
i
> > see this markert being staturated very very quick.. i can see 100p
and a
> > good item in trade or a item worth 200pp in trade ... i'm all for
barter
...
> > but at 100pp per bow in gerneral auction ...seem to me to undermine
all
of
> > our hard work. please help what is a fair price for bow in open
market
> >
> > thanks
> > karvar
>
